1. Nurse
2. Hag
3. Blight
4. Garbage maps and rotation
5. Tunnellers and facecampers

Great game with a lot of potential -  Different game modes, more characters, and different objectives for survivors could help this game be popular for a long time. 

If you're a horror fan I would definitely recommend buying this game!

the game is good it just never works correctly and most times doesnt work at all. The devs are a joke.

El juego es en si una trampa en el fondo de la cuesti√≥n, todo el tiempo sacan nuevos personajes con habilidades que a veces llevar a una ventaja en el juego. Te mantiene constantemente teniendo que farmear para llegar a la combinaci√≥n perfecta y si en alg√∫n momento se llega, se siguen agregando personajes nuevos. El ciclo nunca termina.

En vez de concentrarse en la diversi√≥n del juego en si mismo, la orientaci√≥n de los desarrolladores se da por este constante agregado de caracter√≠sticas. Manteni√©ndote enganchado buscando llegar a la mejor combinaci√≥n y termina siendo no m√°s que eso. Inclusive casi obligado a agregar dinero en transacciones, o sea juntando puntos dedic√°ndole una inmensa cantidad de horas.

El ciclo es claro y r√≠diculo, porque si no estuviera esta trampa intr√≠nsica realmente es un juego que es muy repetitivo y aburre pronto. Juego de mierda.
sure this game has lots of bugs... but its extremely fun for you and your friends!! 10/10 you should really get this game!!!!

if you're looking for a scary competitive game, then this is a great game for that although, word of advice there are some people who camp in the game and that can ruin the fun. Just a warning but i 100% love this game a recommend it to you.
Really great game to play with friends and just have a good time.
√â realmente muito bom pra jogar com amigos, algumas coisas deixam a desejar, mas os pontos positivos se sobressaem.
imo granie killerem jest zbyt ≈Çatwe. Survy majƒÖ przejebane. Gra zawiera mn√≥stwo bag√≥w. jaki kolwiek balance>>>? zapomnij................

I have played this game on and off for about 3 years now and I always come back to it. It has a very simple concept but it takes time to master the mechanics of the game for both survivor and killer. It's a lot more fun to play with at least one other when playing survivor. Communication is lost a lot of the time in game as there is minimal gestures.
Good game. Unbalanced but they're trying. Addictive as hell. Very fun when you're winning. Not so much when you're losing.
Ez the best game ever, but it takes some time to git gud

The game sucks, just as bad as Rocket League. This is the type of game that keeps you coming back, because it's community is toxic and irritates the piss out of you. You aren't going to have fun playing this so don't buy it.

Unless you like being in abusive relationships, then this is the game for you.

I mean the dopamine hits different when you blink half across the map with nurse  and hit the enemy straight after. Pure fucking satifaction. 9/10 would recommend. 6h play time

Edit: after 179h of play time I can say that this is ass. Like seriously it is COPIUM of the highest degree. It was fun. Now it is only fun with friends and only sometimes. 7/10 would recommend but you gotta be pacient M8.
vontade de pular de um pr√©dio.

y solo se enfocan en sacar skins dlc etc. pero si los debs arreglaran esos bugs DBD fuera un jugaso
nice game overall, very fun w your friends.
Leider √ºberhaupt nicht ausgeglichen. Der Killer ist stets im Vorteil. Macht als Gruppe leider keinen Spa√ü.
Fun. If you want to suffer get this game.
this game is awesome just grape some friends and play it it will feel better
Fun first game to learn on PC
This game may seem simple on the outside but after many hours of game play you realize there is so much to master which makes you want to keep coming back for more!
gra do dupy ale i tak w nia gram bo nie mam w nic innego .
Game! Good! Good Game! Game Good!
this game is some good ass shit

Having played this game for years, I've admittedly got tired of it here and there but always come back. They are also constantly working on the game, and releasing dlc. Which is more than I can say for most game companies.

Cheese heist simulator is one of the greatest franchises of all time although CHS 1 is more lackluster than 2 or 3 it still offers a unique and refreshing way to view the franchise from its roots. I would rather say just play 2 for the gameplay or 3 for the story I feel that it is important to play the first game in the series because it seems that most players have forgotten it.

Infinite replay value along with infinite ptsd/nightmare value! Bought EVERY DLC and am currently addicted to the game. 
If you like Horror movies, then I think I can safely say you will enjoy playing this!

well tibia honest the game itself is good it has some problems but the game is fun and the cosmetics are very nice and very very climatic and the game has lots of good kilers both iconic and original wich are well made by BHVR to fit dbd and i honestly recomend this game to everyone

P.s. just don't play trickster
It's pretty decent if you tunnel the shit out of people. :)
